title: Varun Aaron announces retirement from representative cricket - Cricbuzz
summary:
Varun Aaron Announces Retirement from Representative Cricket

Published on: Fri, Jan 10, 2025, 10:01 AM
Source: Cricbuzz

Fast bowler Varun Aaron has retired from all representative cricket following Jharkhand's exit from the ongoing Vijay Hazare Trophy. After giving up red-ball cricket, he now relinquishes white-ball formats as well.

  • Varun Aaron, 35, has announced his retirement after a career spanning over two decades.
  • He took three wickets at an average of 53.33 in the ongoing Vijay Hazare Trophy.
  • Aaron mentioned his gratitude and love for fast bowling in his retirement announcement on Instagram.
  • He made his debut in ODI and Test cricket after a remarkable performance in the 2010-11 Vijay Hazare Trophy.
  • Aaron played 18 international matches, taking 29 wickets for India.
  • In first-class cricket, he took 173 wickets and appeared in nine IPL seasons, winning a title in 2022.
“Fast bowling has been my first love, and though I step off the field, it will always be a part of who I am.” - Varun Aaron

Aaron's departure marks the end of a significant chapter in his cricketing journey, but he looks forward to enjoying life beyond the field.
newTitle: Varun Aaron Announces Retirement from Representative Cricket

title: Samsung Galaxy S25, S25+, S25 Ultra price leaked, phones could cost more this time - India Today
summary:
Samsung Galaxy S25, S25+, S25 Ultra price leaked, phones could cost more this time

Published on: Jan 10, 2025 by: Nandini Yadav

Samsung is scheduled to host the Galaxy Unpacked event on January 22, showcasing the new Galaxy S25 series, with leaked pricing information surfacing ahead of the official announcement.

Key Points:

  • The Galaxy S25 series will include the S25, S25+, and S25 Ultra, with rumors of an S25 Slim variant.
  • Pricing for the Galaxy S25 starts at 964 euros (~Rs 85,000) for the 128GB model, with higher capacities costing more.
  • The Galaxy S25+ is expected to start at 1,235 euros (~Rs 1,09,000), while the S25 Ultra could start at 1,557 euros (~Rs 1,38,000).
  • Colour options include icy blue, mint, navy, silver, and more premium shades for the Ultra variant.
  • Pre-reservations in India have begun, allowing customers to customize their orders and receive exclusive offers.

Notable Quotes:

“Pre-reservations in India have started for Rs 1,999, offering early access and benefits worth Rs 5,000.”

As the release date approaches, consumers are eager to see how the new models will compete in the high-end smartphone market.
newTitle: Samsung Galaxy S25 Series Pricing Leaked Ahead of Launch

title: "I'm Only Human, Not God": PM Modi In Podcast Debut With Zerodha Chief Nikhil Kamath - NDTV
summary:
I'm Only Human, Not God: PM Modi In Podcast Debut With Zerodha Chief Nikhil Kamath

Publication Date: New Delhi

Source: News Article

In his debut podcast appearance on Zerodha co-founder Nikhil Kamath's show, Prime Minister Narendra Modi acknowledged his flaws, stating, 'I too can make mistakes.' He comforted Kamath over his Hindi skills, emphasizing their shared understanding.

  • Prime Minister Modi discusses his humanity and the inevitability of mistakes.
  • Nikhil Kamath expresses concerns about his language skills due to his South Indian background.
  • The podcast covers Modi’s childhood, education, and challenges faced in politics.
  • PM Modi actively engages with Kamath, making the dialogue personal and relatable.
  • Modi shared a light-hearted anecdote about his childhood chores.
'Mistakes happen, and I too can make some. I am also a human, not god.' - PM Modi

Modi shared a heartfelt message with listeners, hoping they enjoyed the podcast as much as he did creating it.
newTitle: Prime Minister Modi Reflects on Human Experience in Podcast Debut

title: 300 million-year-old hotspot linked to the formation of the Great Lakes discovered by scientists; where i - The Times of India
summary:
300 million-year-old hotspot linked to the formation of the Great Lakes discovered by scientists; where is it now?

Publication Date: N/A

Source: N/A

The discovery of a hotspot beneath the ancient supercontinent Pangaea is a significant advancement in understanding the geological history of the Great Lakes region.

  • The Cape Verde hotspot has been linked to the formation of the Great Lakes over 300 million years ago.
  • The discovery reveals how tectonic activities and glacial movements contributed to shaping the landscape.
  • Seismic anomalies indicate past deformation of the lithosphere beneath the Great Lakes region influenced by the hotspot.
“The connection between the Cape Verde hotspot and the Great Lakes adds a new layer of understanding to geological processes.”

This groundbreaking research helps to understand not just the formation of the Great Lakes, but also the broader trends in geological developments influenced by ancient hotspots.
newTitle: 300 Million-Year-Old Hotspot Linked to Formation of Great Lakes Discovered

  • Sussanne Khan celebrated by sharing a group picture and expressed her belief that Hrithik's best is yet to come.

title: Oppo Reno 13 and Oppo Reno 13 Pro launched: Price in India, specs, and all you need to know - Hindustan Times
summary:
Oppo Reno 13 and Oppo Reno 13 Pro launched: Price in India, specs, and all you need to know

Date: January 9, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Oppo has unveiled the Oppo Reno 13 series, featuring the Oppo Reno 13 and Oppo Reno 13 Pro 5G, positioned as upper mid-range devices.

Key Points:

  • Oppo Reno 13 priced at ₹37,999 for 8GB RAM/128GB storage; 8GB RAM/256GB for ₹39,999.
  • Oppo Reno 13 Pro priced at ₹49,999 for 12GB RAM/256GB storage; 12GB RAM/512GB for ₹54,999.
  • Available in Luminous Blue and Ivory White (Reno 13) and Mist Lavender and Graphite Grey (Reno 13 Pro).
  • Ships starting January 11 via Oppo's website and Flipkart.
  • Both models feature MediaTek Dimensity 8350 chipset with varying RAM and storage options.
  • Display: Reno 13 Pro has a 6.83-inch AMOLED, Reno 13 has a 6.59-inch display, both with 120Hz refresh rate.
  • Camera: Reno 13 Pro has a triple setup (50MP main, 50MP telephoto, 8MP ultrawide); Reno 13 has a 50MP main, 8MP ultrawide, and 2MP monochrome.
  • Battery: Reno 13 Pro has a 5800mAh battery with 80W fast charging; Reno 13 has a 5600mAh battery with similar charging.

Notable Quotes:

“Both phones offer instant bank discounts of 10%.”

Conclusion:

The launch of the Oppo Reno 13 series enhances Oppo's mid-range offerings, with competitive pricing and specifications appealing to a wide audience.
newTitle: Oppo Reno 13 and Oppo Reno 13 Pro launched: Price in India, specs, and all you need to know

title: What to drink for weight loss? Nutritionist shares 5 detox beverages to reduce fat - Hindustan Times
summary:
What to drink for weight loss? Nutritionist shares 5 detox beverages to reduce fat

Jan 10, 2025 02:20 PM IST - Hindustan Times

Hydration is crucial when trying to lose weight. The article emphasizes the importance of detox drinks, which provide natural goodness while being low in calories.

Key Points:

  • Importance of hydration in weight loss.
  • Detox water is low in calories and energizing.
  • 5 detox drinks recommended: Methi water, Fennel water, Cinnamon orange infusion, CFC tea (Coriander, fennel, and cumin), Tulsi and ginger root boost.
  • Benefits of detox water include detoxifying the body, adding electrolytes, vitamins, and minerals.
  • Experts highlight benefits such as improving metabolism and digestion.
“Detox water has a lot of benefits minus calories. These fruits add electrolytes, vitamins, and minerals [to water] and keep your body hydrated.” - Nutritionist Kavita Devgan

This article provides insights into how detox beverages can support weight loss and overall wellness.
newTitle: Detox Beverages for Weight Loss: 5 Refreshing Recipes from a Nutritionist

The new flagship model starts at ₹69,999 for the 12GB RAM/256GB storage variant and will be available across various platforms including OnePlus's website and Amazon.

title: Physicists spot 44 stars no one knew existed thanks to ‘cosmic hall of mirrors’ effect - The Indian Express
summary:
Physicists spot 44 stars no one knew existed, thanks to ‘cosmic hall of mirrors’ effect

Publication Date: January 10, 2025 Source: Indian Express

A group of physicists at Durham University in the UK has identified over 44 previously unknown stars located in the Dragon Arc galaxy, nearly 6.5 billion light-years away.

  • The stars were hidden behind the Abell 370 cluster of galaxies.
  • Identified using images from the James Webb Space Telescope (JWST).
  • Discovered stars observed during “cosmic noon,” a peak star birth era.
  • Gravitational lensing allowed for magnification of distant light.
  • First significant observation of stars at such a distance.
“This very particular type of star we have detected in the Dragon Arc, called red supergiants, are very difficult to observe...” - Dr. Mathilde Jauzac

This discovery could enhance understanding of star formation and the universe's evolution.
newTitle: Physicists Discover 44 Previously Unknown Stars Using Gravitational Lensing

  • The attack appears to be unprovoked and unexpected.
  • Authorities are conducting an investigation to understand the motive behind the attack.
  • Emergency services were dispatched promptly to treat the injured.
Witnesses reported frightening scenes as the attack unfolded, with many students fleeing the area.

This shocking event has raised concerns about safety in educational institutions and the mental health of individuals within the community.

title: HMPV Case LIVE: India saw over 200 infections till December; what WHO said about the virus? | Today News - Mint
summary:
HMPV Cases in Gujarat Rise: Eight-Year-Old Boy Infected

Date: 10 Jan 2025 Source: Live Mint

As cases of Human Metapneumovirus (HMPV) rise in India, state governments are raising surveillance measures. A recent case of an eight-year-old boy in Gujarat adds to the growing number of infections.

  • HMPV infections now number three in Gujarat, increasing concern among health officials.
  • Health Minister JP Nadda reassured the public that HMPV is not new and urged for precautions during the winter illnesses surge.
  • Since January 7, nine cases have been reported in India with initial cases in Karnataka and Tamil Nadu.
  • The World Health Organization states HMPV is a common seasonal virus.
  • The virus primarily affects the respiratory system, with symptoms akin to common colds.
“Every child will have at least one infection with HMPV by their fifth birthday.” - Paul Hunter, Professor of Medicine

This incident emphasizes the ongoing importance of monitoring respiratory viruses and taking necessary precautions.
newTitle: HMPV Cases in Gujarat Rise: Eight-Year-Old Boy Infected

title: Vodafone Increases Stake in Vi to 24.39 Percent After Completing Share Placing in Indus - TelecomTalk
summary:
Vodafone Boosts Stake in Vi to 24.39% with Indus Towers Share Placing

Publication Date: January 10, 2025 | Source: Telecom Talk

Vodafone Group Plc announced it has increased its stake in Vodafone Idea Limited (Vi) following a financial transaction involving Indus Towers that secured Vodafone's obligations.

  • Vodafone invested Rs 19.1 billion to raise its stake in Vi to 24.39 percent.
  • Rs 8.9 billion was allocated to repay borrowings and transaction fees.
  • The funds enabled Vi to settle its Master Service Agreement dues with Indus Towers.
"Vi have used the proceeds from this Capital Raise to pay outstanding Master Service Agreement (MSA) dues to Indus. Following this, Vodafone's obligations to Indus under the Security Arrangements have now been satisfied in full," Vodafone stated.

This strategic move allows Vodafone to enhance its stake in the competitive telecom market while fulfilling financial commitments to Indus Towers.
newTitle: Vodafone Boosts Stake in Vi to 24.39% with Indus Towers Share Placing

title: Xiaomi Pad 7 launched in India with Snapdragon processor and 144 Hz display - The Hindu
summary:

Xiaomi has officially launched the Pad 7 in India, featuring a powerful Snapdragon processor and various accessories.

  • The Pad 7 includes a Snapdragon 7+ Gen 3 processor with up to 12 GB RAM and 256 GB storage.
  • It features an 11.2-inch display with a 144 Hz refresh rate and peak brightness of 800 nits.
  • The tablet is powered by an 8,850 mAh battery with a 45 W fast charger included.
  • Camera specifications include a 13 MP rear camera and an 8 MP front camera.
